Task.title: Task
Task.description: Represents a task in the TaskFlow application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Task entity.

userId.description: Reference to User. The user who created the task.

listId.description: Reference to the List this task belongs to.

description.description: A more detailed description of the task.

isComplete.description: Indicates whether the task is complete or not.

SubTask.title: SubTask
SubTask.description: Represents a sub-task within a parent task.

id.description: Unique identifier for the SubTask entity.

isComplete.description: Indicates whether the subtask is complete.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the TaskFlow application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.  This will likely be the Firebase UID.

List.title: List
List.description: Represents a user-created list or category for tasks.

id.description: Unique identifier for the List entity.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this list.

icon.description: The SVG string for the list's icon.

definition.description: Stores user profiles. Document ID is the Firebase UID.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase UID of the user.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase UID of the user who owns the list.

params.name: listId
params.description: The unique identifier for the list.

definition.description: Stores tasks created by each user. Tasks are stored in a single collection and can be filtered by listId on the client.

params.name: userId
params.description: The Firebase UID of the user who created the task.

params.name: taskId
params.description: The unique identifier for the task.
